pullRequest.title: [2.19.x] DDF-UI-309 Result form collection creates empty items
pullRequest.bodyText:
ddf-ui PRs:
3.4.x codice/ddf-ui#310

What does this PR do?
Issue 1 - Result form collection creates empty items when it shouldn't for Guest
Issue 2 - Not able to set default a Result form item (already fixed in 2.19.x)
Who is reviewing it?

@andrewzimmer
@hayleynorton
@cassandrabailey293
@zta6
Select relevant component teams:
Ask 2 committers to review/merge the PR and tag them here.
@bdeining
@mojogitoverhere
How should this be tested?

Issue 1:
You should be logged in as Guest (Confirm by checking on upper right corner)

Go to Result Forms
Click on "New Result Forms" to add new result form
Ensure you get two error pop up messages, and ensure no Result From Box are created

Issue 2:

Log in as admin (Confirm by checking on upper right corner)
Ensure in Search form no default is selected for existing Search forms, or make sure no Search forms are created
Go to Result form
Click on "New Result Forms" to add new result form
Make created result form as default
Ensure no error on console and the star icon appears and the 3 dots setting on lower right corner does not disappear.
Clear default Result form
Ensure no regression
Do step 3 to 8 for Search Form

Any background context you want to provide?
What are the relevant tickets?
codice/ddf-ui#309
Screenshots

Before


After


Checklist:

 Documentation Updated
 Update / Add Threat Dragon models
 Update / Add Unit Tests
 Update / Add Integration Tests

Notes on Review Process
Please see Notes on Review Process for further guidance on requirements for merging and abbreviated reviews.
Review Comment Legend:

✏️ (Pencil) This comment is a nitpick or style suggestion, no action required for approval. This comment should provide a suggestion either as an in line code snippet or a gist.
❓ (Question Mark) This comment is to gain a clearer understanding of design or code choices, clarification is required but action may not be necessary for approval.
❗ (Exclamation Mark) This comment is critical and requires clarification or action before approval.

commit.message: DDF-UI-309 Result form collection creates empty items

nodes.bodyText: ❓ why did you need the wait?
